./server [ port #] [ unique ID ] [# peers ] ( repeat [ ID ] [ IP ] [ port #])
./server 12345 0 2 1 22.22.22.22 12345 2 33.33.33.33 12345
./client 123.456.789.123 12345 1 128 3
./client ip 12345 1 128 3

# ssh into the instances
ssh qsaasp@linux-071.khoury.northeastern.edu                    10.200.125.71
ssh qsaasp@linux-072.khoury.northeastern.edu                    10.200.125.72
ssh qsaasp@linux-073.khoury.northeastern.edu                    10.200.125.73
ssh qsaasp@linux-074.khoury.northeastern.edu                    10.200.125.74
ssh qsaasp@linux-075.khoury.northeastern.edu                    10.200.125.75

# local
./server 12345 0 1 1 10.200.125.72 12345
./client 127.0.0.1 12345 1 2 1

# client
./client 10.200.125.71 12345 4 40000 1

# 5 servers
./server 12345 0 4 1 10.200.125.72 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345 4 10.200.125.75 12345
./server 12345 1 4 0 10.200.125.71 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345 4 10.200.125.75 12345
./server 12345 2 4 0 10.200.125.71 12345 1 10.200.125.72 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345 4 10.200.125.75 12345
./server 12345 3 4 0 10.200.125.71 12345 1 10.200.125.72 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345 4 10.200.125.75 12345
./server 12345 4 4 0 10.200.125.71 12345 1 10.200.125.72 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345

# 4 servers
./server 12345 0 3 1 10.200.125.72 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345
./server 12345 1 3 0 10.200.125.71 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345
./server 12345 2 3 0 10.200.125.71 12345 1 10.200.125.72 12345 3 10.200.125.74 12345
./server 12345 3 3 0 10.200.125.71 12345 1 10.200.125.72 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345

# 3 servers
./server 12345 0 2 1 10.200.125.72 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345
./server 12345 1 2 0 10.200.125.71 12345 2 10.200.125.73 12345
./server 12345 2 2 0 10.200.125.71 12345 1 10.200.125.72 12345

# 2 servers
./server 12345 0 1 1 10.200.125.72 12345
./server 12345 1 1 0 10.200.125.71 12345

# 1 server
./server 12345 0 1 1 10.200.125.72 12345

# scp
scp -r ./laptop_factory_src/ qsaasp@login.khoury.northeastern.edu:
